alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 12:02PM CST until March 03 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN SUMNER COUNTY... At 1202 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Scottsville, or 20 miles south of Bowling Green, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Portland and Oak Grove. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
